SELECT SEQ_ODR_CODE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER (ODR_CODE, MEM_ID, ODR_NAME, ODR_ZIPCODE, ODR_ADDR, ODR_ADDR_D, ODR_PHONE, ODR_TOTAL_PRICE, ODR_MESSAGE, PAYMENT_STATUS) VALUES (#{odr_code}, #{mem_id}, #{odr_name}, #{odr_zipcode}, #{odr_addr}, #{odr_addr_d}, #{odr_phone}, #{odr_total_price}, #{odr_message}, #{payment_status})

INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER_DETAIL (ODR_CODE, PDT_NUM, ODR_AMOUNT, ODR_PRICE) SELECT #{odr_code}, C.PDT_NUM, C.CART_AMOUNT, C.CART_AMOUNT * P.PDT_PRICE FROM TBL_CART C INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON C.PDT_NUM = P.PDT_NUM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}

INSERT INTO TBL_PAYMENT (PAY_CODE, ODR_CODE, PAY_METHOD, PAY_DATE, PAY_TOT_PRICE, PAY_REST_PRICE, PAY_NOBANK_PRICE, PAY_NOBANK_USER, PAY_NOBANK) VALUES (SEQ_ODR_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{odr_code}, #{pay_method}, SYSDATE, #{pay_tot_price}, #{pay_rest_price}, #{pay_nobank_price}, #{pay_nobank_user}, #{pay_nobank})
